### TENDER ANNOUNCEMENT
---
#### Multi-disciplinary Architecture and Engineering Consultant Services

[Reference Number: MX-22767296992](https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2502720167/abstract?language=EN)

**Overview**

The Government of Canada, through Defence Construction Canada, invites consultants to submit proposals for the provision of multi-disciplinary architecture and engineering consultant services. This project seeks to establish a source list of pre-qualified consultants who will provide professional services as and when required to support the Department of National Defence's (DND) needs.

**Description**

This tender request is for the establishment of a source list to provide a range of services, including architectural, engineering, and technical support, over a period of three (3) years with a maximum estimated value of $35,000,000. The expected services are as follows:

- Project Manager
- Sustainable Development Expert
- Mechanical Engineer (senior and intermediate)
- Electrical Engineer (senior and intermediate)
- Structural Engineer (senior and intermediate)
- Civil Engineer (senior and intermediate)
- Architect (senior and intermediate)
- Senior Technical Support (all disciplines)
- Intermediate Technical Support (all disciplines)
- Total Classification Rate (Affected Hourly Rate)

**Submission Requirements**

Consulting firms interested in providing these services are invited to submit a shortened proposal through the MERX Electronic Bidding System on or before the specified closing date. For further details regarding the submission process, please visit MERX's website (http://www.merx.com).

**Additional Information**

* The tender document is available on MERX's website (http://www.merx.com).
* The Security Requirements for this project are outlined within the request for proposals (RFP) document.
* Interested parties can view awarded contracts on the Construction de Décence Canada website.
